p:
In December 2019, the World Health Organization office in China was informed of cases of pneumonia of unknown etiology detected in Wuhan.
1 A new coronavirus called SARS-CoV-2 was identified in lower respiratory tract samples from several patients. The virus has spread worldwide and on March 11, 2020, was declared a pandemic by the World Health Organization. From the time of its detection to April 26, 2020, more than 2,900,000 cases have been confirmed worldwide with more than 203,000 deaths. In Colombia, 5379 cases have been confirmed, with 244 deaths reported. 2, 3, 4
